page.title: 10BIOGRAPHIES
page.content: { Mrs Conway and Mrs Laycock } {30 years ago}there were 60 to 100 children at school in 2 classes. They started at 5 and finished at 15. The subjects they did are the same as in 1985.To write with they used{ink {and ink wells.}There were more shops than now. The jobs were{farming, {local shops, factories}in Leeds Pontefract and Selby.{ {Mr.Gill.} Mr Gill has lived in the village all his life.He was born next door to the thatched cottage,above{50 yrs.ago. He started school when he was 4 & left at 14.There were 120-150 children in 8 classes.School was from 9am-4pm with 1 &1/2 hrs for dinner.They were taught reading,writing,arithmetic & games.The writing materials were{ink,pen&pencil. The heating was coke stoves.Work was at the{Hall or the railway station.
